text: "We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together" is a 2012 song recorded by American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift. Swift co-wrote the song with its producers Max Martin and Shellback. The song is about Swift being frustrated at her ex-lover wanting to fix their relationship. The song was the lead single from her album Red. Rolling Stone named this song the second best song of 2012. The song hit #1 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:2012 songs Category:Taylor Swift songs Category:Pop songs Category:Diss tracks
title: We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together
